title: FIT File: Big Bike Tech Drops from Garmin and Wahoo!
content:
﻿

In this episode, we chat about the new Wahoo TRACKR Radar, ROAM 3, BOLT 3, along with the Garmin Varia Vue headlight camera.

For those not subscribed to the FIT File (it’s free!) via your regular podcast app or on YouTube, here’s a quick post with the highlights from the most recent episode. Here’s the chapters for this episode:

0:00 What’s Coming Up
2:03 Garmin Varia Vue
24:18 Prices and Tariffs
30:14 Wahoo ELEMNT ROAM 3 and BOLT 3
42:15 Wahoo TRACKR Radar
